name: js-rust-iter
description: Lazy iterators based on the Iterable protocol, inspired by Rust

scripts.bundle: mkdir dist/esm && deno bundle mod.ts dist/esm/mod.js
scripts.esm-to-cjs: mkdir dist/cjs && babel --plugins @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs dist/esm/mod.js --out-file dist/cjs/mod.js && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run bundle && npm run esm-to-cjs && npm run types

author: Teodor Maxim
